conbody.p: The include the GNU C++ compiler (nanomips-elf-g++). The nanomips-elf-g++ compiler supports modern C++ features, and benefits from all ’ enhancements and optimizations to the common back-end of GCC. Use of C++ exceptions and/or run-time type identification incurs a significant size overhead. If these features are not required by your code, then they can be switched off individually using the −fno−exceptions and −fno−rtti options respectively.
